amendment.description: To provide adequate funds for the Surplus Books Program of the Library of Congress.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2953 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2953 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hyde-Smith to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4334) To provide adequate funds for the Surplus Books Program of the Library of Congress.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2953 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2953 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hyde-Smith to Amendment SA 2910.
